name: Egg Fried Rice
instructions: Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat.
Whisk eggs in a bowl and pour into the hot wok. Scramble until cooked through.
Remove the scrambled eggs from the wok and set aside.
Add cooked rice to the wok and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until heated through.
Add carrots and peas and stir-fry for another minute until heated through.
Stir in sesame oil and soy sauce.
Add the scrambled eggs back into the wok and combine with the rice and vegetables.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
